description.value:
Animist Spiritual energy reinforces your body, making you more resilient. Your proficiency rank for Fortitude saves increases to expert.

Bard, Investigator Your physique has grown hardy in your adventures. Your proficiency rank for Fortitude saves increases to expert.

Druid Adventures have made your physique more hardy. Your proficiency rank for Fortitude saves increases to expert.

Swashbuckler Your physique has grown hardy in your adventures. Your proficiency rank for Fortitude saves increases to expert.
